review: We are very happy with Oasis fertility hospital services. we got to know about this hospital through our friend. Dr. M V Aruna madam has been very polite and humble enough to understand the situation and suggested for tests and accordingly initiated the treatment. Very soon we have got the positive results and we and our family are very happy about it. we recommended this hospital to the needy. Overall it was a wonderful experience. we thank all the doctors the hospital staff.

Dr.MVD  Aruna Madam is excellent in treating fertility  issues . We consulted her last month . She cleared all our doubts . Best treatment is given to us . We are happy taking treatment here in Oasis Uppal  with  Dr. Aruna Madam .Thank you  oasis ,we would also recommend our family and friends.

I am very glad to share my views. Dr.M V D Aruna mam is so humble and so dedicated to her work and always cares her patients. In our interaction I understood that she has given a sufficient time to express my health issues. The way she handles the patients is very much impressive, and my sincere thanks to entire team of Uppal staff for a friendly envirnoment.
As she is very good and very concern on protocols and out come of the discussion very transparency for the same

Am very happy to share my review on this..Dr.Durga Aruna mam gave me excellent care and made me about as comfortable as I could be ! I would like to thanks each and every person at Oasis fertility Uppal for made my parenthood happy..
Thank you !
As visited the centre as they are explaining the process and they were very clear on explanation and other parameter
